languages.text: {n}Реальность теряет свою незыблемую твердость, становится податливой. Сначала кажется, что один из солдат пытается прошептать вам что-то, но этот шепот исходит не с той стороны барьера. Он рождается прямо в ваших ушах. "Эмпиреи — с тобой. Ты — с нами. Сила — в твоей руке. Тебе — даровано. Повелевай". Энергии Имматериума окутывают ваши пальцы, готовые исказить бытие по вашей воле.{/n}

{n}Reality loses its unshakeable hardness and becomes malleable. At first, you think one of the soldiers is trying to whisper something to you, but the whisper is coming from the wrong side of the barrier. It is coming from inside your ears. "The Empyrean is with you. You are with us. The power is in thine hands. To thee it is given. Thou shalt command." The energies of the Immaterium envelop your fingers, ready to bend existence to your will.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Реальность теряет свою незыблемую твердость, становится податливой. languages.text: {n}La réalité perd sa dureté inébranlable et devient malléable. Vous avez l'impression qu'un des soldats tente de vous murmurer quelque chose, mais le murmure ne provient pas de son côté de la barrière. Il provient de l'intérieur de vos oreilles. « L'Empyrée est avec vous. Vous êtes avec nous. Le pouvoir est entre vos mains. Il vous est accordé. Vous commandez désormais. » Les énergies de l'Immaterium enveloppent vos doigts, vous donnant la capacité de plier l'existence à votre volonté.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reality loses its unshakeable hardness and becomes malleable. At first, you think one of the soldiers is trying to whisper something to you, but the whisper is coming from the wrong side of the barrier. It is coming from inside your ears. "The Empyrean is with you. You are with us. The power is in thine hands. To thee it is given. Thou shalt command." The energies of the Immaterium envelop your fingers, ready to bend existence to your will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La réalité perd sa dureté inébranlable et devient malléable. Vous avez l'impression qu'un des soldats tente de vous murmurer quelque chose, mais le murmure ne provient pas de son côté de la barrière. Il provient de l'intérieur de vos oreilles. « L'Empyrée est avec vous. Vous êtes avec nous. Le pouvoir est entre vos mains. Il vous est accordé. Vous commandez désormais. » Les énergies de l'Immaterium enveloppent vos doigts, vous donnant la capacité de plier l'existence à votre volonté.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La realidad pierde su solidez inherente para volverse maleable. Al principio, te parece que uno de los soldados intenta susurrarte algo, pero el sonido proviene del otro lado de la barrera. Está dentro de tus oídos. «El Empíreo está contigo. Tú estás con nosotros. El poder está en tus manos. Te lo otorgamos. Tuya es la autoridad». Las energías del Inmaterio envuelven tus dedos, listas para manipular la existencia a tu voluntad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reality loses its unshakeable hardness and becomes malleable. At first, you think one of the soldiers is trying to whisper something to you, but the whisper is coming from the wrong side of the barrier. It is coming from inside your ears. "The Empyrean is with you. You are with us. The power is in thine hands. To thee it is given. Thou shalt command." The energies of the Immaterium envelop your fingers, ready to bend existence to your will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La realidad pierde su solidez inherente para volverse maleable. Al principio, te parece que uno de los soldados intenta susurrarte algo, pero el sonido proviene del otro lado de la barrera. Está dentro de tus oídos. «El Empíreo está contigo. Tú estás con nosotros. El poder está en tus manos. Te lo otorgamos. Tuya es la autoridad». Las energías del Inmaterio envuelven tus dedos, listas para manipular la existencia a tu voluntad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}现实世界失去了对物质的掌控，变得柔韧可变。一开始，你以为是某个士兵打算对你耳语，但随后你便意识到，耳语的声音实际上来自能量场的另一边，是从你的耳朵里直接响起来的。“至高天与你同在，你与我们同在。力量就在你手中，这是赐予你的力量。对这个世界下命令吧。”来自亚空间无形的能量包裹住了你的手指，你的意志即将改变现实世界中的存在。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reality loses its unshakeable hardness and becomes malleable. At first, you think one of the soldiers is trying to whisper something to you, but the whisper is coming from the wrong side of the barrier. It is coming from inside your ears. "The Empyrean is with you. You are with us. The power is in thine hands. To thee it is given. Thou shalt command." The energies of the Immaterium envelop your fingers, ready to bend existence to your will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}现实世界失去了对物质的掌控，变得柔韧可变。一开始，你以为是某个士兵打算对你耳语，但随后你便意识到，耳语的声音实际上来自能量场的另一边，是从你的耳朵里直接响起来的。“至高天与你同在，你与我们同在。力量就在你手中，这是赐予你的力量。对这个世界下命令吧。”来自亚空间无形的能量包裹住了你的手指，你的意志即将改变现实世界中的存在。{/n}

languages.text: {n}現実は揺るぎない頑健さを失い、柔らかくなる。最初は兵士のひとりがあなたに何かをささやこうとしているのかと思ったが、そのささやきはバリアの反対側から聞こえてきた。それは、あなたの耳の中から聞こえてくるのだ。「エンピリアンはお前とともにある。お前は我々とともにある。力は汝の手の中にある。汝に与えられる。汝が指揮を執るのだ」非物質世界のエネルギーがあなたの指を包み、あなたの意のままに存在を歪める力を与えようとしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reality loses its unshakeable hardness and becomes malleable. At first, you think one of the soldiers is trying to whisper something to you, but the whisper is coming from the wrong side of the barrier. It is coming from inside your ears. "The Empyrean is with you. You are with us. The power is in thine hands. To thee it is given. Thou shalt command." The energies of the Immaterium envelop your fingers, ready to bend existence to your will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}現実は揺るぎない頑健さを失い、柔らかくなる。最初は兵士のひとりがあなたに何かをささやこうとしているのかと思ったが、そのささやきはバリアの反対側から聞こえてきた。それは、あなたの耳の中から聞こえてくるのだ。「エンピリアンはお前とともにある。お前は我々とともにある。力は汝の手の中にある。汝に与えられる。汝が指揮を執るのだ」非物質世界のエネルギーがあなたの指を包み、あなたの意のままに存在を歪める力を与えようとしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Realität verliert ihre unerschütterliche Härte und wird formbar. Zuerst glaubst du, einer der Soldaten würde versuchen, dir etwas zuzuflüstern, doch das Flüstern kommt von der falschen Seite der Barriere. Es kommt von innerhalb deiner Ohren. "Das Empyreum ist bei Euch. Ihr seid bei uns. Die Macht liegt in Euren Händen. Euch wird sie gegeben. Ihr sollt befehlen." Die Energien des Immateriums umhüllen deine Finger, bereit, die gesamte Existenz deinem Willen zu beugen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reality loses its unshakeable hardness and becomes malleable. At first, you think one of the soldiers is trying to whisper something to you, but the whisper is coming from the wrong side of the barrier. It is coming from inside your ears. "The Empyrean is with you. You are with us. The power is in thine hands. To thee it is given. Thou shalt command." The energies of the Immaterium envelop your fingers, ready to bend existence to your will.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gerçeklik, sarsılmaz sertliğini kaybedip şekillendirilebilir bir hâl alıyor. Başta askerlerden birinin sana bir şeyler fısıldamaya çalıştığını sanıyorsun ama fısıltı, bariyerin diğer tarafından geliyor. Onu kulaklarının içinden duyuyorsun. "Gök Diyar seninle. Sen bizimlesin. Güç senin ellerinde. Güç sana verildi. Emret." İradenle var oluşu bükmeye hazır Tindiyar enerjisi, parmaklarını sarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reality loses its unshakeable hardness and becomes malleable. At first, you think one of the soldiers is trying to whisper something to you, but the whisper is coming from the wrong side of the barrier. It is coming from inside your ears.
